intro: Introducing Med, your tech-savvy ally! Armed with a Master's degree in Cloud Software Engineering and a rich background in cutting-edge technologies, he's dedicated to bringing your website and mobile app visions to life. With Med on board, rest assured that your projects will be handled with precision, delivering top-quality results while meeting all deadlines.
intro_long: As a highly skilled software engineer specializing in web technologies, I possess exceptional expertise. With a track record of creating high-performance full-stack web applications, I have mastered a range of modern tools such as React.js, Vue.js, Node.js, Express, Nest, and to a lesser extent, Angular, Spring, Django. My expertise also extends to databases, including Postgresql, MySQL, Firebase, and MongoDB.
